◆ Addresses an issue where the app would sometimes crash when streaming video over cellular data

Anime your way. Check out our most recent update.
There’s no denying your anime adventures are about to get even more awesome and will ensure you—the anime king or queen—has the best streaming experience out there.

App improvements include:
◆ And you shall be called… Funimation. The only “now” we’re dropping is from the name. All your favorite subs and dubs are still available to watch anytime, anywhere, and on your favorite devices.
◆ Have you seen Paranoia Agent? The mind-bending supernatural mystery from Satoshi Kon and Madhouse, is now streaming for the first time—exclusively on Funimation!

◆ Have you seen Paranoia Agent? The mind-bending supernatural mystery from Satoshi Kon and Madhouse, is now streaming for the first time—exclusively on Funimation!

Anime your way. Check out our most recent update!

◆ Fixes for Chromecast
◆ Added mini Chromecast controller so you can browse the rest of the app while casting
◆ Updated the expanded Chromecast controller
◆ Fix for video player to resume properly when switching the language

Anime your way. Check out our most recent update!

◆ Fixes for Chromecast
◆ Added mini Chromecast controller so you can browse the rest of the app while casting
◆ Updated the expanded Chromecast controller
◆ Fix for video player to resume properly when switching the language

Anime your way. Check out our most recent update!

◆ Fixes an issue where the app crashes while marathoning
◆ Adds a previous button to the video player
◆ Fixes an issue where subtitles always have to be turned on manually when watching in Japanese
◆ Adds the ability to pause ads and exit the player during ad playback
◆ Fixes an issue where a black screen would appear during first time launch after installing for devices on iOS 13

Stream anime your way! The latest version of Funimation should make your streaming experience better
Updates include bug fixes and overall performance improvements around:
- Video playback and launching from the Continue Watching section
- Cast icon presence on screens that allow you to continue casting your favorite shows
- Videos download capabilities while Funimation app is in the background

Stream anime your way! The latest version of Funimation should make your streaming experience better
Updates include bug fixes and overall performance improvements around:
- Video playback and launching from the Continue Watching section
- Cast icon presence on screens that allow you to continue casting your favorite shows
- Videos download capabilities while Funimation app is in the background

After perfecting our breathing forms like Tanjiro and Nezuko, we’ve come up with some great new additions to the Funimation app that’ll make your anime streaming experience flow like the perfect breath before battle.
◆ Added direct link to reset password
◆ Added Crashlytics SDK
◆ Fixed an issue where subtitles must always be turned on instead of turning on automatically

After perfecting our breathing forms like Tanjiro and Nezuko, we’ve come up with some great new additions to the Funimation app that’ll make your anime streaming experience flow like the perfect breath before battle.
◆ Added direct link to reset password
◆ Added Crashlytics SDK
◆ Fixed an issue where subtitles must always be turned on instead of turning on automatically

◆ Decreases size of thumbnails
◆ Allows the user to remove videos from their history via Recently Watched screen
◆ Fixes Navigation Issues
◆ Fixes Chromecast functionality during marathon mode
◆ Overlapping thumbnails fixed
◆ Fixes overlap of top portion of screen on certain iPhone 12 models
◆ Additional bug fixes and performance improvements

◆ Now available in Australia and New Zealand
◆ Portrait orientation on iPad
◆ General bug fixes and stability improvements

◆ Now available in Australia and New Zealand
◆ Portrait orientation on iPad
◆ General bug fixes and stability improvements

New iOS, who dis? We took your feedback and built the anime app of your dreams. New look, better tools, more anime, easy to use.

What We Did
◆ Brand-new interface
◆ Easier navigation
◆ Better searches and filters
◆ Watch History added
◆ A new section: My Anime
◆ New, custom video player
◆ Improved Show Details
◆ Account Migration including your downloads & queue
◆ Ability to save more than 20 queued items
